column5: Looks super stable and would grab lots of stares for sure.
Weird.  Bumper boats.  Hey!!  That'y my spot..  Smash smash smash!!!
Why do i feel like theres going to be hundreds of these in my canal come spring? Lol
I need one of these! Probably thousands of dollars out of my price range in this lifetime, though.  Edit: looks like they'd cost around $2000US to deliver to Canada.

My dad was telling me about this on the weekend. Interesting concept... but if I'm about to buy something in this price range I'd rather just get a used tinny. On the website they're listed $1,595 (but sold out). My only question is how do you transport it?
My only question is how do you transport it?  Utility Trailer
